content: the luti hood is a unisex one-size pattern with loose fit designed for adults it features brioche stitch colour accents on the ribbings and an i-cord drawstring the hood is knitted bottom up starting with 1x1 ribbing in the round then brioche stitch is worked in the round for the neck part after binding off some stitches the rest of the hood is worked flat along with brioche decreases for shaping around the face and at the top back three-needle bind off is used to close the hood at the top next stitches are picked up around the front opening to work 1x1 ribbed brim then double folded i-cord string is worked separately and then placed inside the brim suggested yarn sandnes garn double sunday kroopa wool or any other dk weight yarn 50 g/100 m 350 m 383 yd of main colour 26 m 28 yd of contrast colour tag me @_debska_ and use #lutihood hashtag
